lead_paragraph: A year after staving off relegation, France charged into the Davis Cup final for the first time since 2002, beating Argentina, 5-0, while Serbia will join them in the final for the first time.
snippet: A year after staving off relegation, France charged into the Davis Cup final for the first time since 2002, beating Argentina, 5-0, while Serbia will join them in the final for the first time.
